channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Senate Dems target Black voters with new ad as Harris’ support falls short
item.description: Senate Democrats are advertising to Black voters specifically as Vice President Kamala Harris struggles with the voting group.

item.title: Harris to showcase 100 anti-Trump Republicans at campaign event in Philadelphia suburbs
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris on Wednesday will tout her GOP support in a bid to attract Trump-wary Republicans and independents in Bucks County, Penns...

item.title: Georgia shatters voting record, officials say new election laws' liberal critics proven wrong
item.description: Georgia, a critical swing state, demolished its record for ballots cast on the first day of early voting, state officials said.

item.title: Biden Puts Israel in an Impossible Position
item.description: From Jerusalem’s perspective, Israel already has complied with the administration’s newest demands.

item.title: Georgia judge blocks state's ballot hand counting rule
item.description: A judge has blocked a new rule that requires Georgia Election Day ballots to be counted by hand after the close of voting. The ruling came a day after...

item.title: The Vilification of Elon Musk Is about Politics, and Nothing More
item.description: He is a genius and a lunatic, conspiratorial and visionary and childish — and all those things are probably related.

item.title: San Francisco’s War on Women
item.description: A ballot measure would make it a crime to care for pregnant women without referring them to an abortion clinic.

item.title: After Denouncing ‘Disinformation’ In Interview, Harris Spreads Lies About Trump
item.description: Lying is like eating potato chips to Harris -- she can’t tell just one.

item.title: Orbán, Russia, China, Iran, &c.
item.description: Once again, Senator Mitch McConnell issues a warning about the Hungarian leader.

item.title: The Education Department’s Inexcusable Inaction in Confronting Antisemitism
item.description: It could issue one simple directive to universities: Expel students who call for violence against Jews, or lose federal funding.

item.title: CW Upgrades ‘Scrabble’ And ‘Trivial Pursuit’ From Board Games To Game Shows
item.description: Scrabble and Trivial Pursuit have been mainstays of American living rooms for decades. Now they're on television.

item.title: Mayorkas Stonewalls Ohio’s Request To Help Track Foreign Nationals On Voter Rolls
item.description: In his defense, the DHS secretary has been busy enjoying high-end sushi and shopping in fashionable Georgetown boutiques.

item.title: Virginia Department Of Elections Has Been Complicit For Years In Registering Noncitizens To Vote: County GOP
item.description: Virginia bureaucrats have failed at multiple steps to keep the state's voter rolls clean, according to the Fairfax Republican Party.

item.title: North Carolina Democrat leader resigns after arrest for allegedly stealing Trump roadside signs
item.description: Moore County, North Carolina, Democratic Party Chair Lowell Simon resigned after admitting to stealing pro-Trump political signs.
